scripts.build: npm run generate-local && graph build subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.build-develop: npm run generate-develop && graph build subgraph.mumbai-develop.yaml
scripts.codegen: npm run generate-local && graph codegen subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.codegen-develop: npm run generate-develop && graph codegen subgraph.mumbai-develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: npm run codegen && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-local subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-release: npm run generate-release && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-mumbai-release subgraph.release.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-develop: npm run generate-develop && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-mumbai-develop subgraph.develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-gke-develop: npm run generate-develop && graph deploy --ipfs https://subgraph.startbahn.jp/ipfs/ --node https://subgraph.startbahn.jp/admin/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-develop subgraph.mumbai-develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-gke-release: npm run generate-release && graph deploy --ipfs https://subgraph.startbahn.jp/ipfs/ --node https://subgraph.startbahn.jp/admin/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-release subgraph.mumbai-release.yaml
scripts.deploy-gke-master: npm run generate-master && graph deploy --ipfs https://subgraph.startrail.io/ipfs/ --node https://subgraph.startrail.io/admin/ startbahn/startrail subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-gke-polygon: npm run generate-polygon && graph deploy --ipfs https://subgraph.startrail.io/ipfs/ --node https://subgraph-lum.startrail.io/admin/ startbahn/startrail-polygon subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.deploy-develop: npm run generate-develop && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-develop --access-token $TOKEN subgraph.mumbai-develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-release: npm run generate-release && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-release --access-token $TOKEN subgraph.mumbai-release.yaml
scripts.deploy-master: npm run generate-master && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail --access-token $TOKEN subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-polygon: npm run generate-polygon && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-polygon --access-token $TOKEN subgraph.polygon.yaml
